Name

addborder - surround an input image with a border image

Synopsis

addborder inimage borderimage outimage

Description

addborder Surrounds the input image with the border image. The four quadrants of the border image are placed at the four corners of the input image, and the edges are extended to connect the corners surrounding the border image. Three existing borber image files can be found in ~4Dgifts/iristools/images/{cutline.bw, regmark.bw, shadow.bw}.

See Also

addframe(6D)
